## Air Zones

British Columbia is divided into geographical areas called air zones. These areas were defined based on common characteristics such as air quality, geography, meteorology, pollution sources, and other factors. The intent behind this delineation is to manage air quality in the most effective and efficient manner.

-   Coastal

-   Central Interior

-   Georgia Strait

-   Lower Fraser Valley

-   Northeast

-   Northwest

-   Southern Interior

Use the map to learn more about each of B.C.'s air zones.
